mapper.select: select /* com.antjump.ant.payment.dao.PaymentMapper#selectPaymentsList */ a.payment_id , a.payment_time , a.payment_key , a.payment_status , b.member_id , b.member_name , c.refund_yn from tbl_payments a left join tbl_members b on (a.fk_members_payments = b.member_id) left join tbl_payment_state_histories c on(a.payment_id = c.fk_payments_states) order by payment_id desc

select /* com.anjump.ant.faq.dao.PaymentMapper#selectPaymentsDetail(String paymentId) */ a.payment_id , a.payment_time , a.payment_key , a.payment_status , b.order_id , b.order_amount , c.member_id , c.member_name , c.member_email , c.member_phone , c.member_type , d.refund_yn , d.refund_reason , e.goods_use_yn , e.goods_remaining_date from tbl_payments a left join tbl_orders b on (a.fk_orders_payments = b.order_id) left join tbl_members c on (a.fk_members_payments = c.member_id) left join tbl_payment_state_histories d on(a.payment_id = d.fk_payments_states) left join tbl_goods_possessions e on (e.fk_orders_possessions = b.order_id) where a.payment_id = #{ paymentId }
mapper.insert: insert /* com.anjump.ant.faq.dao.PaymentMapper#createOrder(PaymentCreateDTO paymentCreateDTO) */ into tbl_payments ( payment_key , payment_status , fk_members_payments , fk_orders_payments ) values ( #{ paymentKey } , #{ status } , 1 , (select max(order_id) from tbl_orders) )

insert /* com.anjump.ant.faq.dao.PaymentMapper#createOrder(PaymentCreateDTO paymentCreateDTO) */ into tbl_payment_state_histories ( payment_state , fk_payments_states , fk_members_payment_states ) values ( #{ status } , (select max(payment_id) from tbl_payments) , 1 )

insert /* com.anjump.ant.faq.dao.PaymentMapper#createOrder(PaymentCreateDTO paymentCreateDTO) */ into tbl_goods_possessions ( goods_remaining_date , fk_goods_possessions , fk_orders_possessions ) values ( 30 , 1 , (select max(order_id) from tbl_orders) )
